Title: Man and Beast
Writer: Sigmund Bendkover, Al Bronsowy, Sveta Lukic
Actors: Götz George, Günther Ungeheuer, Alexander Allerson, Petar Banicevic
Plot: End of the WWII, concentration camp somewhere in Poland. Prisoners have heard that Germans have plans to kill them all, before the Allies come. One of the prisoners escapes, and tries to find the Allies. A manhunt begins.
